biotools.summary: Calculate the basic property of peptides/proteins. The properties include the Isoelectric point (pI), Mass weight (MW) and Hydrophobicity (Hy). Additionally, amino acid composition of all peptides/proteins in the list was also calculated.

bioschemas.name: ProPAS
bioschemas.summary: Calculate the basic property of peptides/proteins. The properties include the Isoelectric point (pI), Mass weight (MW) and Hydrophobicity (Hy). Additionally, amino acid composition of all peptides/proteins in the list was also calculated.
